message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $12000 for the product.
